|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = 9 |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Serial numbers may start with CJK0 and CJK1. There may be multiple revisions of this device. [http://svn.dd-wrt.com/changeset/3348 DD-WRT Trac states the device uses BCM5325E], FCC photos show BCM5325F, OpenWrt wiki states BCM5325F There is a NEC USB 2.0 controller on-board. ==Links of Interest== [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Linksys_WRT54G_series WRT54G series on Wikipedia]
